name: Elevation (Punished_Angell)
description:
Sleep deprived, overworked, and Struggling to cope, you as an office worker is after yet another hard day's work and on your way home, but seems things have gone a bit too far.

Move your way through nightmarish places figure out puzzles and find your way out of the ruthless cycle of your life, maintaining your sanity, finding out what's real and what is fake, and coming to terms with your addictions. 

Made by Fireteam Games: 
Andrew Watters (Artist/UI Designer/Project Leader) - https://www.artstation.com/angell446/https://sketchfab.com/Angelll446

James Munnis(Programmer/Project manager)  - https://www.artstation.com/jamesmunnis

Toby Johnston (Modler/Level Designer)  - https://sketchfab.com/Toby_Johnston

Elijah Pearson (Sound Engineer) - https://sketchfab.com/Epearson62213

James Shore (Modler) -  https://sketchfab.com/CannonMonkey
